remarks: Define the cotangent function.  We define it this way for ~ cmpt , which requires the form ` ( x e. A |-> B ) ` .  The cot function is defined in ISO 80000-2:2009(E) operation 2-13.5 and "NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions" section on "Trigonometric Functions" ~ http://dlmf.nist.gov/4.14 (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 14-Mar-2014.)
statement:
df-cot $p |- cot = ( x e. { y e. CC | ( sin ` y ) =/= 0 } |-> ( ( cos ` x ) / ( sin ` x ) ) ) $.
$d x y $.
